comment: So many feels in this video. We can't tell you just how much we love this community, and getting to travel with you is just the absolute BEST. If you want to join us in Costa Rica this September, there are still a couple spots available. Sign up here: https://hopscotchtheglobe.com/costa-rica-group-trip/
